Jicai Medicine Store: Relationship 1: Mrs. Wei (Lv Caiqian) and Mingsha (Tan Renchang's wife) are close friends, having known each other since childhood and sharing a love for Western games. They have a strong bond and trust each other deeply.
Relationship 2: Mrs. Wei (Lv Caiqian) and Xinya (Mingsha's maid) have a friendly relationship, having spent time together on various occasions and sharing stories about their lives.
